results.title: Metformin: A Review of Potential Mechanism and Therapeutic Utility Beyond Diabetes
results.text_hl: Evidence shows that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ crosses the blood-brain barrier to enter the brain and confers diverse neuroprotective effects which can prove beneficial in @DISEASE_Cognition_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D003072 @@@cognitive impairment@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Huntington_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006816 @@@HD@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Huntington_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006816 @@@Huntington's disease@@@), @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@, and probably @DISEASE_Dementia @DISEASE_MESH:D003704 @@@dementia@@@.

citations.NLM: Dutta S, Shah RB, Singhal S, Dutta SB, Bansal S, Sinha S, Haque M. Metformin: A Review of Potential Mechanism and Therapeutic Utility Beyond Diabetes Drug Des Devel Ther. 2023;17():1907-1932. PMID: 37397787
citations.BibTeX: @article{37397787, title={Metformin: A Review of Potential Mechanism and Therapeutic Utility Beyond Diabetes}, author={Dutta S and Shah RB and Singhal S and Dutta SB and Bansal S and Sinha S and Haque M}, journal={Drug Des Devel Ther}, volume={17}, pages={1907-1932}}

results.title: Overview of Metformin and Neurodegeneration: A Comprehensive Review.
results.text_hl: Originally used as a first-line treatment for @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@, recent studies have begun investigating @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@'s effects beyond @DISEASE_Metabolic_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D008659 @@@metabolic disorders@@@, particularly its neuroprotective capabilities against conditions like @DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D010300 @@@Parkinson's disease@@@, @DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@Alzheimer's disease@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Huntington_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006816 @@@Huntington's disease@@@, and @DISEASE_Multiple_Sclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D009103 @@@multiple sclerosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Kruczkowska W, Gałęziewska J, Buczek P, Płuciennik E, Kciuk M, Śliwińska A. Overview of Metformin and Neurodegeneration: A Comprehensive Review. Pharmaceuticals (Basel). 2025 Mar 28;18(4):. PMID: 40283923
citations.BibTeX: @article{40283923, title={Overview of Metformin and Neurodegeneration: A Comprehensive Review.}, author={Kruczkowska W and Gałęziewska J and Buczek P and Płuciennik E and Kciuk M and Śliwińska A}, journal={Pharmaceuticals (Basel)}, volume={18}, number={4}}

results.title: Endothelial Dysfunction in Huntington's Disease: Pathophysiology and Therapeutic Implications.
results.text_hl: Various therapeutic approaches targeting @DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial dysfunction@@@, including antioxidants, @CHEMICAL_Nitric_Oxide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009569 @@@nitric oxide@@@ enhancers, calcium channel blockers, statins, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, have shown promise in preclinical @<m>DISEASE_Huntington_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006816 @@@HD@@@ models but face translational challenges, particularly regarding optimal timing of intervention and @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ stratification.

citations.NLM: Hu N, Chen Z, Zhao X, Peng X, Wu Y, Yang K, Sun T. Endothelial Dysfunction in Huntington's Disease: Pathophysiology and Therapeutic Implications. Int J Mol Sci. 2025 Feb 8;26(4):. PMID: 40003898
citations.BibTeX: @article{40003898, title={Endothelial Dysfunction in Huntington's Disease: Pathophysiology and Therapeutic Implications.}, author={Hu N and Chen Z and Zhao X and Peng X and Wu Y and Yang K and Sun T}, journal={Int J Mol Sci}, volume={26}, number={4}}

results.title: Metformin reduces prion infection in neuronal cells by enhancing autophagy.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ was reported to be beneficial in various @DISEASE_Proteostasis_Deficiencies @DISEASE_MESH:D057165 @@@protein misfolding@@@ and @DISEASE_Neurodegenerative_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D019636 @@@neurodegenerative diseases@@@ like @<m>DISEASE_Huntington_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006816 @@@Alzheimer's and Huntington's diseases@@@.

citations.NLM: Abdelaziz DH, Thapa S, Abdulrahman B, Vankuppeveld L, Schatzl HM. Metformin reduces prion infection in neuronal cells by enhancing autophagy. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 2020 Mar 5;523(2):423-428. PMID: 31874705

results.title: Metformin as a potential therapeutic for neurological disease: mobilizing AMPK to repair the nervous system
results.text_hl: In a cohort study consisting of 4325 @<m>DISEASE_Huntington_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006816 @@@HD@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, 121 of them were using @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for treatment of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2D.@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ using @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ performed significantly better in cognitive and executive functioning tasks compared to @<m>DISEASE_Huntington_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006816 @@@HD@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ not receiving @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Demaré S, Kothari A, Calcutt NA, Fernyhough P. Metformin as a potential therapeutic for neurological disease: mobilizing AMPK to repair the nervous system Expert Rev Neurother. 2021 Jan;21(1):45-63. PMID: 33161784
citations.BibTeX: @article{33161784, title={Metformin as a potential therapeutic for neurological disease: mobilizing AMPK to repair the nervous system}, author={Demaré S and Kothari A and Calcutt NA and Fernyhough P}, journal={Expert Rev Neurother}, volume={21}, number={1}, pages={45-63}}

results.title: The Effects of Combined Therapy With Metformin and Hydroxypropyl-beta-Cyclodextrin in a Mouse Model of Niemann-Pick Disease Type C1
results.text_hl: Recently, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has proven protective in a wide variety of animal models of @DISEASE_Neurodegenerative_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D019636 @@@neurodegenerative diseases@@@, such as @DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@Alzheimer's disease@@@, @DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D010300 @@@Parkinson's disease@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Huntington_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006816 @@@Huntington's disease@@@.

citations.NLM: Du J, Liu X, Zhang Y, Han X, Ma C, Liu Y, Guan L, Qiao L, Lin J. The Effects of Combined Therapy With Metformin and Hydroxypropyl-beta-Cyclodextrin in a Mouse Model of Niemann-Pick Disease Type C1 Front Pharmacol. 2021;12():825425. PMID: 35095535

results.title: Compounds that extend longevity are protective in neurodegenerative diseases and provide a novel treatment strategy for these devastating disorders.
results.text_hl: In this review, we examine the effects of five compounds that have been shown to extend longevity (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Sirolimus @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020123 @@@rapamycin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Resveratrol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077185 @@@resveratrol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Acetylcysteine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000111 @@@N-acetyl-l-cysteine@@@, @CHEMICAL_Curcumin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003474 @@@curcumin@@@) in four of the most common @DISEASE_Neurodegenerative_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D019636 @@@neurodegenerative diseases@@@ (@DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@Alzheimer's disease@@@, @DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D010300 @@@Parkinson's disease@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Huntington_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006816 @@@Huntington's disease@@@, @DISEASE_Amyotrophic_Lateral_Sclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D000690 @@@amyotrophic lateral sclerosis@@@).

citations.NLM: Soo SK, Rudich PD, Traa A, Harris-Gauthier N, Shields HJ, Van Raamsdonk JM. Compounds that extend longevity are protective in neurodegenerative diseases and provide a novel treatment strategy for these devastating disorders. Mech Ageing Dev. 2020 Sep;190():111297. PMID: 32610099
